3. Data Privacy and Security

This reference implementation demonstrates Green Button data exchange protocols. In a production environment:

  • All customer data must be handled according to applicable privacy laws
  • Secure connections (HTTPS) must be used for all data transmissions
  • Customer consent is required before accessing their energy usage data
  • Data retention policies must comply with local regulations

4. Green Button Compliance

This implementation follows the Green Button standard as defined by the North American Energy Standards Board (NAESB) REQ.21.

5. Disclaimer

This is a reference implementation for demonstration and development purposes. It should not be used in production without proper security hardening and compliance verification.

6. Contact Information

For more information about Green Button, visit: www.greenbuttondata.org
